sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card style="height: 200px;" color="#BF6211">
    <v-card-title class="text-h4 font-weight-black text-white mt-6 ml-4">商品推薦</v-card-title>
    <v-card-subtitle class="text-h6 font-weight-black text-white mt-4 ml-4">
      希望有你喜欢的商品
    </v-card-subtitle>
    <v-card-text>

    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
  <v-card
      class="mx-auto"
      max-width="344"
  >
    <v-img
        src="https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/cards/sunshine.jpg"
        height="200px"
        cover
    ></v-img>

    <v-card-title>
      Top western road trips
    </v-card-title>

    <v-card-subtitle>
      1,000 miles of wonder
    </v-card-subtitle>

    <v-btn
        color="#f28f16"
        class="font-weight-black text-white mt-2 ml-4"
        plain
        @click="toDetail"
    >
      <v-icon>mdi-briefcase-search</v-icon>
      查看详情
    </v-btn>

  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "ProductsFeatured",
  setup() {

    return {

    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
